long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whappo offers an extensive shop or service list for you to shop anytime and anywhere. You can communicate directly with thousands of shops or services, and you can quickly order by chatting with them. With Whappo Chat, you can forward the delivery of the order to your shop. After receiving the order, you can safely pay and find feedback for the shop or service.

This extension is intended to be used by Whappo shops to manage their shops for getting notifications when a new order arrives. User logins to the whappo call center application then by this extension activates the owned shop and starts to receive notifications.
